column5: HI, Been lurking on the forum all summer. Got a boat late last summer and been doing a bit of fishing on Sturgeon Lake. Got some pointers from a few folks on another forum who I think are also on this forum. I plan on doing quite a bit of fishing next spring and summer on Sturgeon. I don't have a cottage, I am retired so I do a lot of day trips and rent cottage the odd time.
Sounds like a great  plan.  Welcome aboard.
Glad you are here you will find loads of info. from fishing to tuning a piano here.   Art
Hey dude, Sturgeon has some big skis. Caught my PB there. Welcome to the community!
Welcome aboard, great folk here. Good luck in your hunt.
Hey dude, Sturgeon has some big skis. Caught my PB there. Welcome to the community! Don't tell him that as now he will be searching for your spots and MY spots!!!

Welcome Derek to OFC. Tighten your seat belt, it may be a bumpy ride. I only bought my first real fishable boat 7 years after I retired. One of the 3 best things I did in my life besides finding my true love and retiring, not necessarily in that order. I'm kidding of course, the best was buying my StarCraft. I am going to change my password now. Don't you dare rat me out M2B2.
